## hpr1187 :: I live in GNU/Emacs

 

I live in GNU/Emacs
===================

1 Emacs on HPR 
===============
Klaatu's 3 part series
- ep0852
- ep0856
- ep0861

2 EmacsWiki 
============
- Ultimate source of information for GNU/Emacs
- [https://emacswiki.org/]

3 Appearance 
=============
- no menus nor scroll bars
- black background on a tiling window, full screen (no decorations)
  - people often think that I am on the console (no X)

4 Daemon 
=========
- [https://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/EmacsAsDaemon]
- so that clients can connect (org protocol)
- use the same emacs from the consoles
  - if x crashes, for instance

5 Editing code 
===============
- c++
- with repls
  - lisp/scheme/clojure/elisp (slime and geiser)
  - python
  - octave
- compilation
- latex

6 Org 
======
- [https://orgmode.org/]
- Note taking
- GTD, agenda, spreadsheet
- Reports, papers, slides, blog
- export to mobile org

7 Gnus 
=======
- [https://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/GnusTutorial]
- Mails
- RSS and mailing lists via gwene
- store links into and open from org-mode

8 w3m 
======
- [https://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/emacs-w3m]
- search and more and more navigation

9 Conkeror (in/out) 
====================
- [https://conkeror.org/]
- only when javascript is required
- org protocol for vzpturing links
- org open link to open pages

10 ERC for IRC 
===============
- [https://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/ERC]

11 Small utilities 
===================
- Info reader
  - [https://emacswiki.org/emacs/InfoMode]
- Calendar
  - [https://emacswiki.org/emacs/CalendarMode]
- Scratch buffer as calculator
  - Evaluating expressions
  - [https://emacswiki.org/emacs/EvaluatingExpressions]
- Dired
  - [https://emacswiki.org/emacs/DiredMode]
- Docview
  - [https://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/DocViewMode]
- Version control
  - [https://emacswiki.org/emacs/VersionControl]
